Description: Steatite shabti of Pediamenope with the head broken away, the remains of a lappet-wig, crossed hands in relief holding the two relief hoes, the legs are inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in four(surviving) rows of incised Hieroglyphs once separated by red lines, the back of one arm is decorated with an incised representation of a seed-basket, the ankle and foot section is missing.
Condition: incomplete - head, ankles and foot section missing
